allow: Bash(wsl bash -c "which psql 2>/dev/null || find /usr -name ''psql'' -type f 2>/dev/null || dpkg -l | grep postgresql 2>/dev/null")
Bash(wsl bash -c "docker exec mentor-db-1 psql -U postgres -c ''CREATE DATABASE video_assets;''")
Bash(wsl bash -c "cat /mnt/c/www/mvp-rag-local/database/migrations/001_create_videos.sql | docker exec -i mentor-db-1 psql -U postgres -d video_assets")
Bash(wsl bash -c "docker exec mentor-db-1 psql -U postgres -c ""SELECT 1 AS test;""")
Bash(wsl bash -c "docker exec mentor-db-1 psql -U postgres -h localhost -c ""SELECT 1 AS test;""")
Bash(wsl bash -c "docker inspect mentor-db-1 --format ''{{range .Config.Env}}{{println .}}{{end}}'' | grep POSTGRES")
Bash(wsl bash -c "docker exec postgres-ubuntu psql -U postgres -h localhost -d video_assets -c ''SELECT count\(*\) FROM videos;''")
Bash(wsl bash -c "cd /mnt/c/www/mvp-rag-local && python3 -m venv venv_wsl && ./venv_wsl/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && ./venv_wsl/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt")

Bash(wsl bash -c "rm -rf /mnt/c/www/mvp-rag-local/venv_wsl && cd /mnt/c/www/mvp-rag-local && python3 -m venv venv_wsl && ./venv_wsl/bin/pip install --upgrade pip -q && ./venv_wsl/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt -q")
